thread.title: This Supercross Rider's Arm Will Make You Never Want To Ride A Motorcycle Ever [Gross]
thread.title_full: This Supercross Rider's Arm Will Make You Never Want To Ride A Motorcycle Ever [Gross]

author: Raphael Orlove on Lanesplitter, shared by Raphael Orlove to Jalopnik
title: This Supercross Rider's Arm Will Make You Never Want To Ride A Motorcycle Ever [Gross]
text:
Photo Credit: Garth Milan / Red Bull Content Pool 
Pictured above is Ken Roczen, supercross rider, in his happy place. Heâ€™s on a bike (kinda) and in the air. Pictured below is Ken Roczen in a slightly less desired position. His arm has been opened up. Advertisement 
As another obvious warning, this is super grody and my coworker could not look at it up on his screen. 
Yes, thatâ€™s his whole arm opened up. Advertisement 
Donâ€™t feel bad, this is part of the healing process. Roczen gave a full damage report a few days ago: 
Dislocated wrist, dislocated elbow and compounded radius. The first 30h absolutely sucked as none of the pain killers worked and it was really swollen. Gonna need few surgeries to get all this dialed. ðŸ”´ I have gotten so many messages and was so pleased to read all of them. I didnâ€™t message back as the circumstances right now are just a bit gnarly and it would probably take me a day to reply lol. Just know I saw them! Love all you! Gonna need a few days for further info.ï»¿
